p:
After the 2005 outbreak, additional SLE outbreaks in Argentina occurred in Parana (2006), Buenos Aires (2010), and San Juan (2011) (Pan American Health Organization, http://www.paho.org/hq/dmdocuments/2010/alert_epi_2010_31_marz_encefalitis_san_luis.pdf). Unfortunately, no ecologic studies focused on these outbreaks. Phylogenetic analysis of SLEV genomes associated with human cases in Buenos Aires confirmed the presence of SLEV genotype III (
30 ).
